name: Luigi
description: The transition to Super Smash Bros. Ultimate was especially beneficial for Luigi; not only was he buffed in terms of speed and damage, he has also received a 0-to-death combo. His down throw is especially deadly, comboing into many options. With his grab now being a tether, Luigi's grapple game is extremely magnified. As far as nerfs, his down special no longer has utility for recovery. Nonetheless, Luigi is a great choice for a fan of combos.

combos.input: dthrow sh+rising+dair ff+nair sh+rising+dair ff+dair uspecial
combos.notes: Credit to Beefy Smash Doods. Works from 0-10% on Heavyweight and Super Heavyweights if you perform another sh+dair into ff+nair before continuing. Adding/removing pummeling can enable this combo when it otherwise wouldn't work.
Credit to Beefy Smash Doods. Adding pummeling can enable this combo when it otherwise wouldn't work.
